sentences.english: A trip to Dubai at the end of March has long been in Allen's planning for Fairy King Prawn.
sentences.chinese: 愛倫早就計劃讓靚蝦王在三月尾遠征杜拜。

sentences.english: Abu Dhabi is actively promoting tourism, competing with Dubai.
sentences.chinese: 阿布達比近年積極推廣觀光，與杜拜競爭意味十足。

sentences.english: Dubai already draws 7 million tourists a year.
sentences.chinese: 每年杜拜已吸引七百萬名旅客來訪。

sentences.english: A robot sits on a camel's back in Dubai.
sentences.chinese: 一個機器人在杜拜騎駱駝。

sentences.english: Compare Los Angeles to Paris, Kuwait to Dubai.
sentences.chinese: 對比洛杉磯與巴黎，科威特與杜拜也是如此。

sentences.english: A year in Dubai changed his view of marriage.
sentences.chinese: 在杜拜一年，改變了賈拉爾的婚姻觀。

definition: Abu Dhabi, capital of United Arab Emirates (Tw)

pinyin: A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Da4 gong1 guo2

definition: Abu Dhabi, capital of United Arab Emirates (UAE)

pinyin: Sha1 wu1 di4 A1 la1 bo2
A1 la1 bo2 Lian2 he2 Qiu2 zhang3 guo2

definition: Burj Khalifa, skyscraper in Dubai, 830 m high
